verses.roman:
tāṅra yugāvatāra jāni' garga mahāśaya
kṛṣṇera nāma-karaṇe kariyāche nirṇaya

synonyms: tāṅra—of Him; yuga-avatāra—incarnation for the age; jāni'-knowing; garga—Garga Muni; mahāśaya—the great personality; kṛṣṇera—of Lord Kṛṣṇa; nāma-karaṇe—in the name-giving ceremony; kariyāche—made; nirṇaya—ascertainment.
translation: Knowing Him [Lord Caitanya] to be the incarnation for Kali-yuga, Garga Muni, during the naming ceremony of Kṛṣṇa, predicted His appearance.
